# Wallet

## Create Wallet <a href="#create-wallet" id="create-wallet"></a>

1. On your computer, open Sync
2. At top right, click <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line"> , it will direct to wallet app
3. At the top, click **New**
4. Fill in fields to create your wallet
5. Write down the mnemonic words
6. Verify the mnemonic words

{% hint style="info" %}
Backup your mnemonic words in a secure manner, preferably offline.
{% endhint %}

## Import Wallet <a href="#import-wallet" id="import-wallet"></a>

1. On your computer, open Sync
2. At top right, click <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line"> , it will direct to wallet app
3. At the top, click **Import**
4. Select a method to import
5. Once the information verified, you can fill in fields to import your wallet

More : [Import from Ledger](ledger-device.md)

## Wallet Security <a href="#wallet-security" id="wallet-security"></a>

{% hint style="info" %}
Always keep your mnemonic safe and do not share your mnemonic with third parties. Do not store your mnemonic online. If you lose your mnemonic you lose your funds.
{% endhint %}

### Export Mnemonic <a href="#export-keystore" id="export-keystore"></a>

1. On your computer, open Sync
2. At top right, click <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line"> , it will direct to wallet app
3. Click the wallet you which needs to export the key store
4. Click **Backup**
5. Enter the wallet password to continue process
6. Copy the mnemonic or export it to the custom path

### Reset Password <a href="#reset-password" id="reset-password"></a>

You can change your wallet's name and password after wallet's password verified.

1. On your computer, open Sync
2. At top right, click <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line"> , it will direct to wallet app
3. Click the wallet you which needs to change the password
4. Click **Reset Password**
5. Enter the wallet password to continue process
6. Enter New password and click save

### Wallet Recovery <a href="#wallet-recovery" id="wallet-recovery"></a>

1. On your computer, open Sync
2. At top right, click <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line"> , it will direct to wallet app
3. At the top, click **Import**
4. Select a method to import
5. Once the information verified, you can fill in fields to import your wallet

## Wallet Activity <a href="#wallet-activity" id="wallet-activity"></a>

<figure><img src="../../../../.gitbook/assets/wallet-detail-activity.0f9d89a3.png" alt=""><figcaption></figcaption></figure>

### Transaction <a href="#transaction" id="transaction"></a>

* Date : Show the date which you signed the transaction.
* Status : There are 4 status of a transaction
  1. **Sending** <img src="../../../../.gitbook/assets/download.png" alt="" data-size="line">: After signing a transaction , sync will send the signed transaction to node. If the transaction can not be sent , you can click <img src="../../../../.gitbook/assets/download (1) (1).png" alt="" data-size="line">to resend.
  2. **Confirming** <img src="../../../../.gitbook/assets/download (2) (1).png" alt="" data-size="line">: The transaction is confirming.
  3. **Confirmed** <img src="../../../../.gitbook/assets/download (3).png" alt="" data-size="line">: The transaction is confirmed.
  4. **Dropped** <img src="../../../../.gitbook/assets/download (4).png" alt="" data-size="line">: The transaction is expired, cannot be resent.
* Category: Transfer / Call / Create
* Link : Application URL.
* Action : Reveal transaction in insight.

### Certificate <a href="#certificate" id="certificate"></a>

* Date : Show the date which you signed the transaction.
* status : Always <img src="../../../../.gitbook/assets/download (3).png" alt="" data-size="line">(Only signed certificated will be recorded.)
* Category: Transfer / Call / Create
* Link : Application URL.
* Action : Reveal transaction in insight.
